item.title: About
item.description: Me Hi. I’m Zair. 22. I currently work as a Fullstack DevOps Engineer at @Accenture Digital in Rio’s office. Highly interest in serverless architectures, cloud-based environment orchestration, agile tooling and technologies in general. I’m also interest in cryptocurrencies (ethereum classic/monero/decred miner) and blockchain applications, team management, security/privacy.
